creator: mdteng@gmail.com
text:
There is a page that consistently causes apache to restart.

I am running Apache 2.2.4 in console mode.  The following error signature is
displayed by windows:

AppName: httpd.exe	 AppVer: 2.2.4.0	 ModName: mod_mem_cache.so
ModVer: 2.2.4.0	 Offset: 000010a1

Contents of error.log:

[Fri Jan 19 10:20:08 2007] [debug] mpm_winnt.c(481): Parent: Sent the scoreboard
to the child

to child process 2400

scoreboard from the parent.

to child process 2400

listeners from parent

port 8080.

port 80.

for /html/en/default/js/dhtmllib.js

declining URL ajp://pc-0665:8009//html/en/default/js/dhtmllib.js

[Fri Jan 19 10:20:10 2007] [notice] Parent: child process exited with status
3221225620 -- Restarting.

creator: mdteng@gmail.com
text:
Taking a closer look, I was able to prevent the crash by issuing the following
statement:

CacheDisable /html/en/default/js/dhtmllib.js

Looking at the javascript file, I noticed that it was blank.

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 40576 ***
